tx_power_dbm.title: Tx Power in dBm
tx_power_dbm.description: Set transmission power of each antenna in dBm

tx_gain.title: Expert: Tx gain
tx_gain.description: Expert only. Tx gain (in dB), can be used instead of TX dBm Power to directly control tx_gain Amarisoft option

rx_gain.description: Rx gain (in dB), it should usually always be between 25 and 45. Please refer to the ORS handbook to see how to fine tune this value

dl_frequency.title: DL Frequency
dl_frequency.description: Downlink center frequency of the cell. Default depends on your ORS model, please refer to the connection parameters. Make sure to not set a value outside the range of your ORS

cell_id.description: Cell ID. Equal to ORS Serial number modulo 256 by default

handover_a1_rsrp.title: Handover A1 event RSRP threshold
handover_a1_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold value in dBm.

handover_a1_hysteresis.title: Handover A1 event hysteresis
handover_a1_hysteresis.description: Integer, range from 0 to 30. A1 hysteresis in 0.5dB steps used for the measurement report triggering condition.

handover_a1_time_to_trigger.title: Handover A1 event time to trigger
handover_a1_time_to_trigger.description: Time in ms during which the A1 event condition must be met before triggering the measurement report.

handover_a2_rsrp.title: Handover A2 event RSRP threshold
handover_a2_rsrp.description: Integer, range from -140 to -43. RSRP threshold value in dBm.

handover_a2_hysteresis.title: Handover A2 event hysteresis
handover_a2_hysteresis.description: Integer, range from 0 to 30. A2 hysteresis in 0.5dB steps used for the measurement report triggering condition.

handover_a2_time_to_trigger.title: Handover A2 event time to trigger
handover_a2_time_to_trigger.description: Time in ms during which the A2 event condition must be met before triggering the measurement report.

handover_meas_gap_config.title: Handover measurement gap configuration
handover_meas_gap_config.description: Configuration of the measurement gap. Ignored if no neighbour cells are configured.

sdr100_offset.title: Expert: SDR100 Offset
sdr100_offset.description: Expert only. Offset to SDR100 board, for fine tuning the initial reference signal power value. Default is -54 for ORS 2x1W and -35 for ORS 2x0.5W
